description: Joseph's Coat (Alternanthera ficoidea (yellow form)) is a unique and stunning houseplant that is sure to brighten up any home. It has large, ornamental green and yellow leaves, which can be arranged in striking patterns. This plant is incredibly hardy and easy to look after - it can survive in low light and with minimal water. In addition, Joseph's coat is also quite drought tolerant. When placed in a sunny spot, its vibrant leaves will really pop against its dark green backdrop. An overall eye-catching and cheerful choice for any home, this species is well worth a try!
